reporting-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

title.narrative: Improving Mexico's Energy Storage capacity to boost renewable energy integration and foster the transition to a low carbon economy

description.narrative: The project will develop a framework to allow the building of energy storage capacity needed to integrate sources of renewable energy into the power grid effectively and achieve the Federal Government's clean energy goals in Mexico. This will also open up the renewable energy sector to UK and other businesses wishing to work in Mexico.

participating-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
